articles.title: Apple unveils AirPods that can work as hearing aids - The Washington Post
articles.description: Apple unveiled new Airpods at its September launch event that will feature hearing aid capabilities.
articles.content:
Hearing aids can be expensive and tricky to access. But building them into headphones, such as Apples popular AirPods, could improve access to hearing treatment, Apple claims.

articles.title: Apple updates AirPods Max headphones with a USB-C port and new colors - TechCrunch
articles.description: The updated version of Apple's AirPods Max are still $549, and can be preordered Monday. With a USB-C port, the updated AirPods Max will now match the rest of Apple's product lineup.
